text: Graciano Rocchigiani (29 December 1963 â€“ 1 October 2018) was a German professional boxer. He was born in Duisburg, North Rhine-Westphalia. He competed from 1983 to 2003. Rocchigiani was a two-weight world champion, having held the IBF super-middleweight title from 1988 to 1989, and the WBC light-heavyweight title in 1998. He held the European light-heavyweight title from 1991 to 1992. Rocchigiani was killed on 1 October 2018 in Belpasso, Italy when he was run over by a car while taking a walk. He was 54 years old. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:German boxers Category:Sportspeople from Duisburg
title: Graciano Rocchigiani
